txt.en: 'The sheep and chickens are back in their pens, the pigs have been mudded, and the cows are fed. I daresay we are ready for the market.\n\n'Please go and let Albin Northcotton know that we are ready.'
'The animals are ready you say? We may just do well this year.'
'Go and let him know that we're ready for the market.'
All of the animals have been taken care of and are ready for the market.
Albin Northcotton is at the Farmer's Market on Northcotton Farm.\n\nAlbin Northcotton will be pleased to hear that the animals are ready for the market.
